name: Algorithm Visualizations
body:
* [Convex Hull](https://raw.github.com/arvieFrydenlund/algorithmVisualizations/master/convexhull.html)
* [Determine if a point is in a convex polygon](https://raw.github.com/arvieFrydenlund/algorithmVisualizations/master/pointInConvexhull.html)
* [Find all antipodal pairs in a convex polygon](https://raw.github.com/arvieFrydenlund/algorithmVisualizations/master/antipodal.html)

***
I'm an undergrad at the University of Saskatchewan.  These sites were created as a project for a web programming class.  email: aaf955@mail.usask.ca
tagline: This is a collection of algorithm visualizations done in HTML5 using canvas
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
